transcript.text: At Johnson Controls we expect all our employees to safeguard all critical and confidential information.

panelText.text:
We all must work together to protect our information. You might have questions about whether certain information is confidential or what you must do to protect it. If so, talk to:
  • your manager
  • the Law department
If you think you know about a confidentiality breach, act immediately!

You can:
  • tell your manager, or a member of the Law or Compliance team
  • call or log your concern on the Johnson Controls Integrity Helpline
